original_text: Now when Sanballat heard that we were building the wall, he was angry and greatly enraged, and he jeered at the Jews.
korean_text: 산발랏이 우리가 성을 건축한다 함을 듣고 크게 분노하여 유다 사람들을 비웃으며

sentences.original_text: Now when Sanballat heard that we were building the wall
sentences.korean_translation: 산발랏이 우리가 성벽을 쌓고 있다는 것을 들었을 때
